item.title: A Whale Acquires Over 10,000 ETH on OTC Platform
item.description: On September 5th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, on the eve of the release of non-farm payroll data, a whale address received 10,039 ETH from Galaxy Digital, with a value of $44.04 million.Address: 0x829a0222379b6edbaf7e7081f00d3ac42f9dffaf.

item.title: Binance Wallet's new TGE STAR will launch on September 6th
item.description: September 5th. Binance Wallet launched the 37th exclusive TGE Starpower (STAR), which was carried out through Pancake Swap.Subscription Period: From 08:00 to 10:00 on September 6, 2025 (UTC).Eligibility Requirement: Users are required to use Binance Alpha Points to participate.Additional Rewards: The upcoming event will offer 17,500,000 STAR tokens, and the details will be announced soon.

item.title: ChainOpera AI is pleased to announce the start of its first visit to China. Renowned scholar and co-founder Salman along with Aiden will be in attendance.
item.description: On September 5th, the world-leading "AI+Blockchain" integration project ChainOpera's China tour is about to arrive in Shanghai and Hangzhou. This project focuses on "Collaborative Intelligence" and has more than 3 million users, over 100,000 developers, and thousands of GPU nodes. Its flagship application previously topped the BSC chain's AI DApp daily ranking.The event will be held on September 6th (Saturday) from 2:00 PM to 6:00 PM in Shanghai and on September 7th (Sunday) from 2:00 PM to 6:00 PM in Hangzhou. The event will analyze cutting-edge developments such as multi-agent collaboration and the Proof of Intelligence (PoI) mechanism, discuss AI's innovation in DeFi, creative and other scenarios, and provide opportunities for developers, the community, and capital to connect. Additionally, the project's co-founders, renowned scholars, member of the US National Academy of Engineering and Dean of the USC Viterbi School of Engineering, Dr. Salman Avestimehr, along with the founder o

item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Surges Above $4400
item.description: On September 5th, according to HTX market data, Ethereum experienced a rebound and broke through $4400, registering a 24-hour gain of 0.84%.

item.title: Value Over $4.4M ENS Unlocked and Transferred to Binance and Galaxy Digital
item.description: On September 5th, as per EmberCN's monitoring, 200,000 ENS tokens (valued at approximately $4.46 million) were transferred from the ENS timelock contract to Binance and Galaxy Digital two hours ago.

item.title: After a brief surge of over 140%, RED retraced and is currently trading at $0.7670.
item.description: On September 5th, perhaps due to the "Upbit to List Redstone (RED) KRW Trading Pair" news, RED witnessed a short-term surge of more than 140%, reaching a peak of $1.19 and then retracting. Currently, it is trading at $0.7670, and its market capitalization is $134 million.

item.title: BiyaPay has launched the "Rising Star Recruitment Program," where the official will provide selected candidates with funding and traffic support
item.description: On September 5th, BiyaPay announced the commencement of the "Rising Star Recruitment Program." This program is intended to recruit Chinese rising stars and provide funding and traffic support to talented teams or individuals, aiming to achieve the common growth of rising stars and the platform. Once selected, participants will be awarded a maximum monthly fixed reward of 2000 USDT, as well as quarterly rewards, special bonuses, project peripherals, and other exclusive benefits. The "Rising Star Recruitment Program" is an integral part of the CoinWedge BIYA Global Crypto Community Influence Program. CoinWedge builders who are selected will receive comprehensive support provided by the officials and are committed to expanding the influence of BIYA CoinWedge in the Chinese community and achieving the common growth of rising stars and the platform.

item.title: Upbit will list Redstone (RED) KRW trading pair
item.description: On September 5th, Upbit is going to list the Redstone (RED) with the trading pair of Korean Won.

item.title: If Ethereum breaks above $4500, the mainstream CEX cumulative short liquidation pressure will reach 1.395 billion.
item.description: On September 5th, based on Coinglass data, if Ethereum manages to break through $4500, the total liquidation intensity of the short positions on mainstream CEX will reach $1.395 billion.On the other hand, if Ethereum drops below $4300, the total liquidation intensity of the long positions on mainstream CEX will reach $0.712 billion.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not display the exact number of contracts awaiting liquidation or the exact value of the contracts being liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to neighboring clusters, that is, the intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what degree reaching a certain price level will have an impact. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that reaching that price will lead to a more intense reaction due to a liquidity cascade.

item.title: Binance will list OPEN on September 8th and assign it a Seed label
item.description: On September 5th, Binance will list OPEN on September 8, 2025, at 13:00 (UTC), and commence trading for the USDT, USDC, BNB, FDUSD, and TRY pairs. OPEN will have a seed label. Users will be able to start depositing OPEN on September 5, 2025, at 9:30 (UTC).It should be noted that OPEN will make its debut on Binance Alpha and be tradable on Binance Alpha (with the specific time to be announced later). However, once spot trading opens, OPEN will no longer be visible on Binance Alpha.
